name: Under Zero
description: Under Zero is a charming adventure 3D game telling a story about heavy fate of a woman.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 Mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2048 Mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
